title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 47.6 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 47.6 - Exemptions

State Regulations

Vehicles or combinations, subject to these regulations, operated by a manufacturer, transporter, dealer, or his agents or employees, and which are being transported for the purpose of weighing, testing, dismantling, transporting or delivering the same, or for the purpose of moving
such vehicles in connection with making installations thereon, or improvements
or repairs thereto, must be equipped with splash guards, but these may be
attached to the vehicle in other than a permanent manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
47.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
